name: Billy craves energy
description:
=-=-=--=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
~~~~Follow the quests in game~~~~
=-=-=--=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

It's a strategic game where you have to balance your energy bar to not let Billy Starve. You just need to have enough energy in your stock, If your stock goes to 0, he'll die.

Billy uses energy

Crop uses energy

Tiles give you more energy

Growing crops cost more energy to stay alive, but rewards more resources.

=-=-=--=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

How to play

-Click on the crops to harvest them

-mouse scroll to zoom in/out

-Arrow or wasd/zqsd to move on the map

-P to pause

=-=-=--=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Known Bugs

-The music doesn't loop

-You can find a way to make everything grow faster, that wasn't intended :p
